name: Name

onyx.0: I am Onyx, spirit of winter. My time has frozen...
onyx.1: The world is trapped in eternal frost. Winds whisper of a broken balance.
onyx.2: Have you come to change fate?
onyx.3: Help me and find the frozen butterfly amidst the snow.

swifty.0: I am Swifty, spirit of spring. The streams no longer sing.
swifty.1: Life hides, waiting for harmony to return.
swifty.2: Only a traveler like you can restore the spring.
swifty.3: Find the spring butterfly among the blooming flowers.

mira.0: I am Mira, spirit of summer. My days are endlessly scorching.
mira.1: The sun burns hotter than it should. Time has been disturbed.
mira.3: Help me and find the summer butterfly under the bright sun.

laurus.0: I am Laurus, spirit of autumn. Leaves fall silently like forgotten memories.
laurus.1: A shadow of time has fallen on my forests.
laurus.2: Do you hear the rustle of the past?
laurus.3: Find the autumn butterfly among fallen leaves.

alreadyHelped: You have already helped this spirit. Thank you!

fountain.title: Ancient Fountain
fountain.line1: You’ve discovered an ancient fountain. Its waters are filled with the magic of a forgotten world.
fountain.line2: During your last journey, you disrupted the temporal balance.
fountain.line3: Now the future has changed. Glitches and anomalies have appeared.
fountain.line4: The fountain asks you to collect butterfly spirits from each season to restore harmony.
fountain.line5: You receive a Portal that allows you to travel between seasons.
fountain.repeat: You already have the Portal. Return once you’ve gathered the butterflies.
fountain.final1: You returned to the fountain with all four butterflies.
fountain.final2: They soar upward, uniting above the fountain.
fountain.final3: Light fills the world, the broken time restored.

overload: You can't drag more than one item!

miniGame.takeBox: You picked up a box. Deliver it to the zone.

titles.message: You’ve restored the balance of time and saved the world. See you again!
